thread.title: Bargain Hunter: Loews’ spa and dining packages through Dec. 31
thread.title_full: Bargain Hunter: Loews’ spa and dining packages through Dec. 31

author: Sandra Barrera
title: Bargain Hunter: Loews’ spa and dining packages through Dec. 31
text:
Indulge in a bit of R&R with one of Loews Coronado Bay Resort’s seasonal packages, including culinary-inspired treatments at Sea Spa and chef-prepared meals at Mistral, valid through Dec. 31.
The “Flavors of the Season Spa Package” starts at $326 per night and includes a Fresh Cranberry and Yogurt Body Wrap, S’mores Manicure and Pedicure, Pumpkin Facial, California Brandy Pear Sea Salt Scrub or Butter Rum Scrub Indulgence, plus a one-time $150 spa credit.
Go with the “Flavors of the Season Dining Package,” starting at $224 per night, and you’ll enjoy Chef Adam Cho’s seasonal menu featuring Seared Scallop with Pumpkin and Pancetta Risotto, in addition to a $50 food and beverage credit for each night of your stay.
To book a package, call 800-235-6397 or go to www.loewshotels.com/coronadobay .
